name: X-StreamSports3
0:
”Alexa, open x. stream sports three”
”Alexa, play x. stream sports three”
”Alexa, start x. stream sports three”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: x. stream sports three
des:
Hastings College is delighted to announce a dynamic new partnership with X-Stream Sports, commencing with the 2024-2025 season. This collaboration promises to deliver extensive coverage of Bronco sporting events to fans everywhere, enhancing the accessibility and enjoyment of our athletic programs. 

Under this groundbreaking agreement, X-Stream Sports will broadcast all Hastings College football games, both home and away. Additionally, comprehensive coverage will be provided for all conference men’s and women’s basketball games, home and away. The partnership also extends to conference home games for baseball, softball, volleyball, and both men’s and women’s soccer matches.

Fans can tune into the games via the X-Stream Sports website at x-streamsports.com, through a free mobile app available on smartphones, or via their smart speakers, ensuring they never miss a moment of the action.

X-Stream Sports is owned and operated by Mike Will—long celebrated as the "Voice" of the Broncos—he has been a cornerstone of the community, providing play-by-play sports coverage for the Broncos since 1999. Will launched X-Stream Sports in September 2023 and has already broadcasted over 75 high school football, baseball, softball, and basketball games through the new service.

X-Stream Sports is a 24-hour sports streaming service that features daily programming from VSIN. To further support the increased coverage of Hastings College sports and enhance high school sports broadcasting, X-Stream Sports is also launching X-Stream Sports 2. This new platform will be accessible online at x-streamsports.com, via the mobile app, or through smart speakers.

Mike, will continue his play-by-play duties for Hastings College football, baseball, and men’s and women’s basketball. Joining the team, Tyson Havranek will provide play-by-play for volleyball, softball, and men’s and women’s soccer. Additionally, Jim Pursell will return to deliver color commentary for Bronco football games.

Stay tuned and experience every thrilling moment with Hastings College and X-Stream Sports!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
